name: Computer use
description: Within Information and Communication Technologies (ICTs), Computer use involves the study of utilizing computers and various computer software and applications for different purposes. These programmes are generally of short duration.

name: Use of software for calculating (spread sheets)
description: Focuses on the practical application of spreadsheet software for tasks such as calculation, data analysis, and visualization, as part of general Computer use skills.

name: Use of software for data processing
description: Covers the skills needed to use software for various data processing tasks including input, manipulation, and output of data, within the scope of Computer use.

name: Use of software for desk top publishing
description: Involves learning to use desktop publishing software to create and format documents for print or digital distribution, a specific skill in Computer use.

name: Use of software for word processing
description: Focuses on the effective use of word processing software for creating, editing, and formatting text documents, a fundamental aspect of Computer use.

name: Use of Internet
description: Covers the skills required for navigating, searching, and utilizing the Internet for information, communication, and other online activities, an essential part of Computer use.
